conversionStrategy.description: Used to define a conversion Strategy

decodingStrategy.description: Used to define a decoding Strategy

key.description: Key is the key used in the Provider, mandatory

metadataPolicy.description: Policy for fetching tags/labels from provider secrets, possible options are Fetch, None. Defaults to None

property.description: Used to select a specific property of the Provider value (if a map), if supported

version.description: Used to select a specific version of the Provider value, if supported
